title: Group portrait of groom leaning on right, wearing moustache, and military uniform with Airman First Class patch on left shoulder, and bride standing, wearing veil, earrings, two strand necklace, light colored wedding dress with scalloped collar, sheer shoulders, lace sleeves, and skirt with floral embroidery, holding bouquet with large light colored ribbon in left arm, posed on altar of church with plants, possibly for Stunt wedding in Central Baptist Church
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
